lexUnit.definition: COD: an area of a country or the world having definable characteristics but not always fixed boundaries.

sentence.text: Iran is motivated by its aspirations for political , religious , and military leadership in the region , unlike North Korea , for whom mere survival appears to be the priority .
Iran currently possesses the capability to employ ballistic missiles and/or long - range artillery rockets against its regional neighbors , Israel and US forces deployed in the region .

Iranian Defense and Foreign Ministry officials continue to defend Iran 's right to protect itself from potential threats in the region , while denying any ill intent towards countries such as the United States .

Iran 's chemical weapons and ballistic missiles , and possibly its nuclear weapon program and biological warfare capabilities , are meant to deter opponents and to gain influence in the Persian Gulf and Caspian Sea regions .
Iran has a stockpile of these weapons , including artillery shells and bombs , which could be used in another conflict in the region .
Maintenance and expansion of Sino - Iranian relations naturally constitutes an important component of Chinese strategy in extending its influence to the region .
Conversely , the US regards Iran as a rogue state that sponsors international terrorism ( including support for terrorists targeting the United States ) and seeks to subvert US allies in the region .
Iran currently possesses the capability to employ ballistic missiles and/or long - range artillery rockets against its regional neighbors , Israel , and US forces deployed in the region .
Libya claims it will not sign the CWC as long as other countries in the region possess NBC weapons .
In the 1960s , Ferndale resident Jack Alderson commanded a group of light tugs that made trips to the islands that last week were declared a monument , as well as other remote atolls in the region .
Farther south in Crete , the Minoan culture developed after 2000 b.c. into the most significant of its age , spreading its influence throughout the region by trade and diplomacy .

In the wake of this tremendous natural upheaval , the Aegean Islands next came under the influence of the Mycenaeans ( at around 1300 b.c. ) , who had a base in the Peloponnese region of the Greek mainland .
Greece moved in to administer the land , but a new influence upset any grand dreams of making this region a part of greater Greece .
One - third of all Hong Kong 's beaches are to be found in a single 14 - km ( 9 - mile ) stretch of this region 's shoreline .

Several forest fires which have ruined well over ten thousand hectares of land are continuing to burn in the Spanish region of Galicia today .
In southern Greece today , huge forest fires continue to burn on destroying homes and causing severe damage to the region .
